phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
Yami, Asta, Charmy, and Finral came to report to the Wizard King
after their battle at the Underwater Temple.
The border town of Kiten, which has a history of skirmishes with the Diamond Kingdom,
is under attack by a Diamond Kingdom squad.
Wh-What is with that massive horde of people?!
Three of the Eight Shining Generals.
What are the Eight Shining Generals?
The eight strongest from the Diamond Kingdom.
They are similar to the Magic Knights Captains of the Clover Kingdom.
The first ones to arrive at Kiten in their time of need were...
The Clover Kingdom's most powerful Magic Knights Squad.
Yami and the others headed to Kiten as reinforcements.
Let us make them regret barging into our country with their muddy boots.
Man, you girls sure are cute!
I know a meadow where there are flowers as beautiful as you two.
Say, why do not we take a little trip there with my spatial magic?
You look like you just saw something really scary.
They are going to murder us!
Hurry up and get us to the town called Kiten!
But I thought we were off today...
You do not get any time off.
You can have all the time off you want once you are dead.
Hurry up with the portal already, you bastard.
C'mon, let us see how far you can jump.
We are counting on you, Finral!
Why are you so raring to go?!
What are you even talking about?
So you are the advance guard for the Golden Dawn?
Not bad for a little brat!
Such a wretched form for a Shining General.
I will lend you a hand.
No one asked for your help!
It appears that the people have great faith in him.
Listen to me when I am talking to you!
In that case, let us see if you can protect yourself as well as your people!
He easily deflected my fastest lightning-coated arrows
and even broke through my barrier?
See if you can actually protect them?
Let us see if you can protect yourself and your comrades.
Yuno and I are one, right?
Hey, why are you ignoring me?
Quit messing with me, you smart-ass!
How dare he make me look like a fool?
Stay out of my way, Brocks!
You stay out of my way!
The kid I encountered in the dungeon has gotten a lot stronger.
Man, it is not fair how fast kids grow.
Way to make an old man feel older.
My girls are growing up fast, too.
they always said they wanted to marry me when they grew up.
But now they will not even take baths with me.
And they do not want my underwear washed with their clothes...
And they say my breath smells like onions...
Steel Creation Magic: Fierce Spiral Lance!
There is no end to them!
His magic keeps clinging to us, making our spells not work properly!
This spell drastically weakens the magic of anyone it catches.
You will never be able to get out of there.
I just love watching powerless weaklings writhe in agony.
Wow, that looks like a tough spell to deal with.
Though, I mean, it is pretty useless against me.
The one thing about this spell is that it sort of destroys anything.
I guess someone will just have to rebuild it.
That guy's definitely the leader of the Golden Dawn.
I wonder why he is just standing there.
He is got his grimoire open, so I think he is using magic, but...
All I see is what looks like tree roots spreading.
A spell to grow a huge tree?
But there is no one who could summon a spell big enough to protect this whole city.
He is using other people's magic?
Why do I always notice stuff like this?
The enemy general, the captain of the Golden Dawn,
seems to be activating a large-scale magic attack.
At the very least, the range will include all of Kiten.
The captain of the Golden Dawn is activating a large-scale magic attack.
And they are definitely not listening.
The great tree shall now bloom!
What the heck is this insane magic?
World Tree Magic: Great Mistilteinn Tree.
All for the Clover Kingdom's prosperity.
What the heck is this giant tree?!
Trees like that grow around here?
Do you think there is giant fruit up there?!
Okay, that is enough out of you idiots.
This is probably Captain Shiny's spell.
Maybe they did not need us after all.
I am going to go check and see how the battle's going.
I am assuming Captain Shiny's up top.
I am going to head up there.
You three help the townspeople, and try not to die.
First, I am going to get me a piece of that fruit.
Apparently, there was an incredible amount of magic on that battlefield.
I suspect this cleaned up most of it, though.
We have suffered a huge loss!
Our army... has basically been wiped out?
You know what they say about people who get greedy.
My arms might be useless, but I have still got my legs!
Please come this way to escape!
It is our duty as Magic Knights to save the citizens of the kingdom.
why do not we... get some tea later?
If I look down, my tears will...
Someone is going head-to-head with one of the Diamond guys in the sky.
You can do it, you can do it, my lovely prince!
This young man is so strong...
I am one of the Eight Shining Generals!
You shall fall before my beautiful magic!
Beauty does not matter in battle.
That is all there is to it.
He defeated him with a single blow!
I thought I saw a familiar little speck.
What are you doing here, Asta?
That guy joined the Magic Knights the same time Asta did.
Not to mention you are all torn up, scrambling around, and soaked with sweat...
He worked his way up into the Golden Dawn's elite?
Of course he would make fun of the Black Bulls.
All that and he is handsome, too.
The fact that you are so beat up means...
You got stronger again, did not you?
I am not losing to you, Asta.
I-I could eat a hundred bowls of rice along with that smile.
You got crazy strong, too, you jerk!
I am not going to lose either, Yuno!
He is an elite in the Golden Dawn,
has super powerful magic, and is super handsome...
Yet he is competing with Asta,
a member of the Black Bulls, who is a meathead with zero magic!
Not that I was worried or anything.
You got hurt because you let your guard down!
I will heal you immediately with my recovery magic.
Go ahead and heal all the citizens.
I should not have been so forward!
We do not have time to deal with you!
I am sure you cannot fight with your arms like that.
But I am not trying to spoil you or anything!
You must be the captain of the Golden Dawn.
Who knew you would have such tremendous magic?
You have got impressive magic yourself.
There is no reason to perish in vain.
Take your comrades and leave this land.
Red Clay Magic: Brilliant Armor Heavy Artillery!
What is that weak little spell supposed to do?
You must be out of magic already.
Your magic has nourished the Clover Kingdom.
He must have been hiding with his magic concealed.
I thought that if I could manage
to bag the Golden Captain, I could turn things around, but...
To think the guy I fought back then would show up.
And he is even stronger now to boot.
Please stop leaving this old guy so far behind.
Looks like you owe me one, Vangeance.
Hey, old Diamond dude that I do not know.
I have got no interest in your filthy-looking chest.
Do not make me cut you down.
So, what is it going to be?
But now's the time to show you guys what a true Diamond looks like, and...
Now that we are alone in a spot with such a great view,
why do not we have a little chat, Vangeance?
Man, your world tree magic is as impressive as ever.
It is possible thanks to the enemies' magic.
Your magic is world tree magic.
Exactly what are you trying to say, Yami?
I am someone who believes his gut instincts.
Could you take off that mask?
To all you Charmy Pappitson fans throughout the world, no... the universe.
This is the moment you have been waiting for.
Today, we will be answering all your requests to see all those cute Charmy moments!
I have been waiting for this!
Deet de-deet de-deet de-deet and go!
La, la, la, la, la, la...
And last but not least, transformation six...
La, la, la, la, la, la...
So there are not seven transformations?
Did you see, Asta, how unbelievably strong I have become?
I am never going to lose to you... not in strength, looks, or height!
Black Clover, Page 53: Behind the Mask.
I am the one who is going to become the Wizard King!
